biotools.summary: CnnCrispr is a deep learning method for sgRNA off-target propensity prediction. It automatically trained the sequence features of sgRNA-DNA pairs with GloVe model, and embeded the trained word vector matrix into the deep learning model including biLSTM and CNN with five hidden layers.
